channel.title: Fictional on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Fictional on ZooBerry

item.title: Unicorn
item.description: Today, Unicorns are mostly illustrated as white horses with a single horn on the forehead. But this is not correct. The best idea of the unicorn’s appearence can be found on gobelins.

item.title: Black Lion
item.description: The black lion is only known to exist in the realm of fiction, folklore, and photoshop hoaxes.

item.title: Phoenix
item.description: The phoenix was originally believed to be a myth, until a group of American scientists discovered a large flock several hundred miles south of Egypt.

item.title: Turkey Raptor
item.description: The Turkey Raptor is a festive dromaeosaurid that only appears once a year, on Thanksgiving.

item.title: Fantasy Wolf
item.description: Here’s a colorful wolf that eats almost anything.
